#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This program is designed to solve the [http://uva.onlinejudge.org/index.php?option=com_onlinejudge&Itemid=8&category=3&page=show_problem&problem=36 Collatz Conjecture] puzzle at UVA.


= Details =

This implementation solves the problem in .132 seconds, resulting in a top 8% ranking.  This is achieved via the use of:
  * a meta cache, composed of the maximum cycle lengths over the range 1 to 1000000 in 1000-sized slices.
  * a lazy cache, which retains the cycle length for any number computed, including intermediary values.
